page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS IN JULY
page.content: Our local paper has had front page stories of the problem at the docks.The workers have been angry with the new owner who made comments about the workface when he {outlined }new proposals for the yard.The men thought that his comments would bring embarrasment to their families. The docks have recently been employing just over {400 men,}and have had plenty of work. A few years ago, over {1000}men worked at the docks.Because so many have been made redundant, {Falmouth} has had a big unemployment problem.Jobs are still hard to find.
